title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with correct username and password, session is persisted, and user is redirected to dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Confirm login is successful, session is persisted, and the user is redirected to the dashboard.

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with invalid username or password and appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input invalid username/email and/or password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login is rejected and an error message is displayed.

title: Dashboard Metrics Display
description: Verify that the dashboard shows correct counts of customers, vendors, products, sales, and incoming down payments.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the dashboard.
Verify the presence and accuracy of statistics cards for customers, vendors, products, sales, and down payments.
Verify charts display sales trends and category distribution correctly.

title: POS Transaction Processing with Full Payment
description: Verify that a transaction can be completed with full payment, with accurate pricing calculations and data saved correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the POS (Kasir) page.
Use autocomplete to select a valid customer by phone number.
Add products using SKU autocomplete to the cart.
Enter valid quantities, and confirm pricing details including subtotal, packing, shipping, discount.
Select full payment option and complete the transaction.
Verify transaction success message and data is stored reflecting correct totals and payment status.

title: POS Transaction Processing with Partial Down Payment
description: Verify the transaction can be processed with a partial down payment and that payment status and balances are tracked correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to POS (Kasir) page.
Select a customer and add products using autocomplete and cart management.
Input a valid down payment amount less than total.
Complete the transaction.
Verify transaction is saved with correct outstanding balance and payment status as partial payment (DP).

title: Product Inventory CRUD Operations
description: Verify adding, updating, deleting products in inventory with correct SKU, categories, stock, and pricing details.

steps.description: Navigate to product inventory page.
Add a new product with valid data including SKU, category, stock, and prices.
Confirm new product is listed with correct details.
Edit an existing product's details (price, stock, category).
Verify updates are persisted and displayed correctly.
Delete a product.
Confirm product is removed from inventory and UI.

title: Product Inventory Search, Filter, Pagination
description: Verify product inventory search, filtering by category, and pagination controls function correctly and update displayed products.

steps.description: Navigate to product inventory page.
Use search input to find products by SKU or name.
Verify results match search criteria.
Apply category filters.
Verify filter applies correctly and updates listing.
Navigate through pagination controls.
Verify products update accordingly on page change.

title: Customer Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify full Create, Read, Update, Delete functionality for customer data including registration date, contact info, and acquisition channel.

steps.description: Navigate to customer management page.
Add a new customer with valid details.
Confirm customer is listed with correct data and initial transaction count.
Edit an existing customer's contact and acquisition channel.
Verify updates are saved and reflected.
Delete a customer.
Confirm customer is removed from the listing.

title: Vendor Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify supplier data management with contact, category, address, and bank account details supports create, edit, delete, and listing.

steps.description: Navigate to vendor management page.
Create a new vendor with all required fields.
Confirm the vendor appears in the list with accurate data.
Update vendor information such as address and bank account.
Verify update is saved and displayed correctly.
Delete a vendor.
Confirm the vendor is removed from the list.

title: Quotation Management Workflow
description: Verify creation, viewing, listing of quotations and ability to convert them into invoices with accurate data.

steps.description: Navigate to the quotation management page.
Create a new quotation with valid customer, item selections, and pricing.
Confirm the quotation is listed and details are correct.
View the quotation details.
Verify all data matches the created quotation.
Convert the quotation to an invoice.
Confirm new invoice is created with data consistent with the quotation.

title: Transaction History Functionality
description: Verify transaction list displays accurate order numbers, customer names, amounts, and supports view, edit, and delete actions.

steps.description: Navigate to transaction history page.
Verify the transaction list is populated with all existing transactions.
Select a transaction to view details.
Verify displayed details are accurate and complete.
Edit a transaction's allowed fields.
Confirm that updates are saved and reflected.
Delete a transaction.
Confirm transaction is removed from history.

title: Payment Settlement Processing
description: Verify tracking and processing of down payments with correct outstanding balance calculations and status updates from DP to fully paid (LUNAS).

steps.description: Access the payment settlement module.
Locate a transaction with an outstanding down payment.
Make a payment to settle part or full outstanding balance.
Verify payment is recorded, balance updated correctly, and payment status changes accordingly.

title: Invoice Generation and Printing
description: Verify invoice can be generated and printed for transactions with full payment or down payment, reflecting the correct details.

steps.description: Open invoice generation page for a full payment transaction.
Verify invoice details including customer, items, payment, and totals are accurate.
Print the invoice and confirm print preview contains correct formatted data.
Repeat above steps for a transaction with down payment.
Verify invoice_dp displays correct outstanding amount and payment status.

title: Responsive Sidebar Navigation and Dynamic Titles
description: Verify sidebar menu is responsive, supports collapsible sections, and page titles update dynamically as user navigates.

steps.description: Navigate through all main menu items.
Verify sidebar expands/collapses menu sections correctly.
Confirm that page title updates dynamically reflecting current page.
Test sidebar behavior on different screen sizes (responsive test).
Verify sidebar adapts correctly with no UI breakage.

title: Data Synchronization with Google Sheets and IndexedDB Offline Caching
description: Verify the data service layer fetches data from Google Sheets, caches locally in IndexedDB, supports offline access and refreshes in background.

steps.description: Load the application with network connected.
Verify data is fetched from Google Sheets and cached into IndexedDB.
Disconnect network to simulate offline mode.
Verify application works with data loaded from IndexedDB without connection errors.
Make a data update offline and reconnect network.
Verify data synchronization occurs and backend Google Sheets updates accordingly.

title: Utility Functions Validation
description: Verify shared utility functions correctly format dates, currency, phone numbers, and display UI loading indicators consistently.

steps.description: Test date formatting utility with various valid and invalid date inputs.
Verify dates are formatted according to expected locale and invalid inputs handled gracefully.
Test currency formatting with positive, zero, and negative values.
Verify currency symbols and decimal placements are correct.
Test phone number formatting with multiple input formats.
Verify formatted phone number matches expected pattern.
Trigger and view UI loading indicators in various modules.
Confirm loading indicators display and disappear as expected.

title: Error Handling for Data Fetch Failures
description: Verify application handles failures of fetching data from Google Sheets gracefully and informs user appropriately.

steps.description: Simulate failure or timeout on Google Sheets API call.
Verify application shows meaningful error message and does not crash.
Retry data fetch or switch to cached IndexedDB data.
Confirm fallback data loading works and user can continue work offline.

title: Session Timeout and Auto Redirect on Unauthorized Access
description: Verify session expiration results in logout and user is redirected to login page when attempting to access protected pages.

steps.description: Log in and remain idle until session timeout occurs.
Try to access dashboard or other protected pages after session expiry.
Verify user is redirected to login page and prompted to authenticate.

title: Input Validation for All Forms
description: Verify all input forms in the app validate required fields, data types, and provide error messages for invalid inputs.

steps.description: Attempt to submit empty forms for login, POS transaction, product entry, customer, vendor, quotation, and payments.
Verify required field validation errors appear and submission is blocked.
Enter invalid data formats such as non-numeric in price fields, incorrect phone formats, invalid date formats.
Verify validation messages appear and invalid data is rejected.

title: Edge Case: Transaction with Zero or Negative Quantity or Price
description: Verify that the system prevents transactions with zero or negative product quantity or price and shows appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to POS page and attempt to add product with zero quantity.
Verify error prevents submission and informs user quantity must be positive.
Attempt to add product or apply discount with negative price or discount.
Verify error messages and prevent transaction completion.
